teal.ui.swing.skin

Class SkinMenuItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • teal.ui.swing.skin.SkinElement
      • teal.ui.swing.skin.SkinMenuItem

  • public class SkinMenuItem
extends SkinElement
    The only case the Skin currently can't handle is a skin for a JMenuItem.
